alert.note: Alert for Culpeper; Prince William; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 6:58PM EDT until August 10 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Virginia, including the following counties: Culpeper, Fauquier, Prince William and Stafford. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 658 PM EDT, emergency management reported multiple roads closed due to flooding. Flooding is ongoing. Between 2.5 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bealeton... Nokesville... Opal... Remington... Catlett... Calverton... Midland... Bristersburg... Morrisville... Lois... Somerville... Casanova... Goldvein... Sumerduck... Heflin... Aden... Elkwood... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
